title: [HOLD for payment 2023-11-02] [$500] Chat - On revisiting from room to chat, the cursor focus is lost in chat section.
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Launch app
2. Tap fab
3. Tap send message
4. Note the cursor focus is present in chat section
5. Tap Room and note the cursor focus is present
6. Again tap chat and note the cursor focus is lost
7. Tap Room and note the cursor focus is present
8. Tap chat and note the cursor focus

Expected result: On revisiting chat section from chat to room and room to chat, the cursor focus must not be lost in chat section

Actual result: None
